channel.title: NPC tele, trade, talk. mostly tele
channel.description: Ok i need to know how to make the npc talk to me..... make the npc have a store..... and make the npc teleport me somewhere..... ALL WITH THE SAME NPC! I've started with the shop...BUT! it opens when you talk to it...not trade..... and i have a little idea about talking.....so... please need help on how to make npc teleport you ONLY WHEN I CLICK TELEPORT AND NOTHING ELSE. and how to make the shop when i press trade not talk..thanx in advance and thanks just for looking...or bumping

item.title: NPC tele, trade, talk. mostly tele
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

For talking, you would put it under the first click NPC packet, and you would just have it show an interface with text on it. Then you would have one of the things he says teleport you when you click it.

Read full topic
item.source: NPC tele, trade, talk. mostly tele

item.source: NPC tele, trade, talk. mostly tele

item.title: NPC tele, trade, talk. mostly tele
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

What base are you using?
The shops have to work, look for case 17:
scroll down a bit and you may see other shops like:

if(NPCID == 1598){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; }
Add yours in there and the trade option should work.
And you aren’t supposed to post your IP here btw, it’s advertising.

Read full topic

item.source: NPC tele, trade, talk. mostly tele

item.title: NPC tele, trade, talk. mostly tele
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

For the “trade” option you need to look for case 17:
That’s your second click npc method.
For the npc dialogue, im sure there is a tutorial somewhere…
Teleport is really easy, on case 155: you add something like this

if(NPCID == 3781){ toX = 2657; toY = 2639; }
I hope that helped

Read full topic
